title: AFK Penalty
body: So I've been waiting over 30 minutes in queue because I left a game unintentionally because the power died and got reported ONCE for AFK. Why is it taking so much longer for queue? I thought I read that only those who left games frequently would wait that long but for me afk once I can't even get into a game and wait forever.

replies.body: And now it says I left champion queue or declined too many games that I have to wait 10 more minutes to go back into queue but when I check the notifications I did not see anything and I was there the whole time during queue.
And it says I'm already in game so I quit and log back in but no reconnect and have to wait another 30 minutes for same thing. Like WTF IS HAPPENING RIOT!!!

It sounds like you're not getting notifications for matches due to a poor connection to the servers. I recommend taking the steps listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this. 

Let me know if those steps cause any change.
Sounds like your client is glitching. Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher and hitting "Repair".
